meanings.sent1: The team's fluking victory surprised everyone.

meanings.definition: A stroke of luck or chance.
meanings.sent1: His promotion was a fluking that changed his life.
meanings.sent2: Winning the lottery was a fluking that made her day.
meanings.sent3: The fluking of finding a four-leaf clover made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The fluking of lightning struck the tree.
meanings.sent5: The fluking of fate brought them together.

meanings.definition: To obtain or achieve by luck or chance.
meanings.sent1: She was fluking a free ticket to the concert.
meanings.sent2: He fluking his way into getting the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent3: They were fluking their way through the maze.
